name: PowerWrite Document
summary: Learn about .PWR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To create a PWR document, select File → Save or Save As, choose the save location, name the file, and click Save. You can also click the large floppy disk icon at the top of the application interface to save the file.
To open a PWR document, select File → Open, navigate to your file, and click Open. You can also click the large folder icon at the top of the application interface to open the file.

description: Document created by J&ASoft PowerWrite, a simple text editor; similar to a .RTF file; contains a rich text document that supports different fonts, font styles, font size, effects and word wrapping.
